name: Baby Organic Joy.ca
tag_list: certified-organic, baby-products, online-store, toronto, canada, safe, affordable, price-guarantee
overview:
BabyOrganicJoy.ca is an online organic baby store based in Toronto, Canada. Our goal is to provide certified organic baby products or those baby products made with organic ingredients available in the market today. For those baby products that are not available in organic form in the market, we chose the next best… Natural. Natural baby products are equally health beneficial because of the removal of various harmful chemicals.

BabyOrganicJoy.ca is proud to offer its customers a wide range of products. Our products include organic bedding, organic carriers, organic clothing, organic diapers, organic teethers, organic skin care and bath and organic toys.

milestones.description: The Organic Trade Association (OTA) is the membership-based business association for the organic industry in North America.
